taskDescription:
Determine whether the Condorcet criterion applies based on the summary of ranked ballots given in the table below.
Votes 3 2
Option A 1 3
Option B 2 1
Option C 3 2
detailedSolution: Yes, because Option A is a Condorcet candidate.
